title: Bhishma's Vow: The Birth of Devavrata's Resolve

chapters.title: A Royal Crisis
chapters.description: The King of Hastinapura, Shantanu, falls in love with Satyavati but her father's condition for marriage creates a dilemma.

chapters.title: The Unyielding Decision
chapters.description: Devavrata, Shantanu's son, vows to renounce his claim to the throne to fulfill his father's wish.

chapters.title: The Terrible Oath
chapters.description: Devavrata takes an oath of lifelong celibacy, earning the title 'Bhishma' for his firm resolve.

chapters.title: A Divine Blessing
chapters.description: Shantanu bestows the boon of ichha-mrityu upon Bhishma, allowing him to choose the time of his death.
